policy_html:
No technology is perfect, and BitHunt believes that working with skilled security researchers across the globe is crucial in identifying weaknesses in any technology. If you believe you've found a security issue in our product or service, we encourage you to notify us. We welcome working with you to resolve the issue promptly.

Disclosure Policy

  • Let us know as soon as possible upon discovery of a potential security issue, and we'll make every effort to quickly resolve the issue.
  • Provide us a reasonable amount of time to resolve the issue before any disclosure to the public or a third-party.
  • Make a good faith effort to avoid privacy violations, destruction of data, and interruption or degradation of our service. Only interact with accounts you own or with explicit permission of the account holder.

Bounty Program

While we appreciate your efforts in helping us keep our service safe, BitHunt cannot provide any monetary rewards at the moment.

In scope

  • XSS
  • Vote manipulation
  • Insertion of unapproved listings to the directory

Exclusions

While researching, we'd like to ask you to refrain from:

  • Denial of service
  • Spamming
  • Social engineering (including phishing) of BitHunt staff or contractors
  • Any physical attempts against BitHunt property or data centers
  • Exposure of server or other component versions (OS version, HTTP server version etc..)
  • ANY open ports

Thank you for helping keep BitHunt and our users safe!

profile.about: BitHunt is a user generated and rated directory for Bitcoin products
profile.name: BitHunt
